mapper.select: SELECT id, userPassword, userType, userName FROM user WHERE id=#{id} and userPassword=#{userPassword}
SELECT u.userNumber, u.id, u.userPassword, u.userName, u.userType, a.adminType, a.accNumber FROM user u, admin a WHERE u.userNumber=a.user_userNumber and id=#{id} and userPassword=#{userPassword}

SELECT u.userNumber, u.id, u.userPassword, u.userName, u.userType, c.phNumber, c.address, c.zipCode FROM user u, customer c WHERE u.userNumber=c.user_userNumber and id=#{id} and userPassword=#{userPassword}

SELECT u.userNumber, u.id, u.userPassword, u.userName, u.userType, s.phNumber, s.address, s.zipCode, s.accNumber, s.bizNumber FROM user u, seller s WHERE u.userNumber=s.user_userNumber and id=#{id} and userPassword=#{userPassword}
